Definition at line 17 of file IValueProvider.h.

Member Enumeration Documentation

enum iproc::IValueProvider::ValueTypeId

Define standard value types.

Enumerator:
VTI_AUTO 

Automatic value, implementation specific.

VTI_POSITION 

Value of position (2D or 3D).

VTI_RADIUS 

Value of radius.

VTI_QUALITY 

Quality factor.

This value should be normalized to range [0, 1].

VTI_ANGLE 

Angle in radian.

VTI_LENGTH 

Length or distance.
